name: PEARSON_CORRELATION
desc: Calculates a Pearson correlation coefficient and the p-value for testing non-correlation.

parameters.name: Χ
parameters.desc: A list of variables from database. The variable should be Real, Float, Integer. It cannot be empty. The length of the list should match Υ

parameters.name: Υ
parameters.desc: A list of variables from database. The variable should be Real, Float, Integer. It cannot be empty. The length of the list should match Χ

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.desc: It contains the names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed. It cannot be empty
